text: untold brings you stories about science
how chemistry physics astronomy and

Alex Danis and we're psyched to have her
on board hey everyone
Alex here and I am so excited to be
joining at the team for this series
so we've taken ten different stories and
tried to dive into the science behind

tides one of my favorites is our first

meaning it's possible he's either not
understood or speaking with a really
weird whale accent which is great so we
